snippet: David O. Russell and the Ghetto Film School are honored by a Screen Actors Guild dinner.
abstract: Several actors and Hollywood insiders gather at 11 Howard hotel in New York City for Screen Actors Guild dinner honoring David O Russell and Ghetto Film School, after-school program in South Bronx that mentors minority children in craft of filmmaking.
lead_paragraph: David O. Russell and the Ghetto Film School are honored by a Screen Actors Guild dinner.

headline.print_headline: A Dinner Where Race Was on the Menu
headline.main: Helen Mirren, Chris Tucker and Allison Williams Talk About Race at SAG-Aftra Dinner
